news.title: Ireland to face Czechia in World Cup 2026 Playoffs
news.summary: The Boys in Green were drawn in path D, alongside Czechia, Denmark and North Macedonia

news.title: My Bloody Valentine reunite to play secret Dublin gig
news.summary: The National Stadium show marks the band's first non-festival Irish gig since 1992

news.title: Blindboy named Best Documentary Presenter at Grierson Awards
news.summary: The Grierson Awards celebrate documentaries made in Britain and abroad.

news.title: Armand Hammer announce Dublin show
news.summary: Tickets go on sale Friday and can be found at the link below.

news.title: Album Review: Blondshell, Another Picture
news.summary: LA alt-pop artist delivers the goods. 8.5/10

news.title: Remembering Dr. John: "My Irish grandfather, he was a very hip old guy. One of the things Irish people are known for is being able to read between the lines..."
news.summary: On this day in 1941, Dr. John – famed for his own solo work, as well as collaborations with The Rolling Stones, Eric Clapton, Van Morrison, Ringo Starr and Aretha Franklin – was born in New Orleans. To celebrate, we're revisiting a classic interview with the legendary musician...

news.title: The Waterboys to bring Fisherman's Blues Revue to 3Arena, with special guest Steve Earle
news.summary: They will perform their late 80s classic album on September 5.

news.title: Lily Allen announces Dublin show
news.summary: Tickets will go on sale Thursday, November 27 at 10am.
